description: A web interface for visualizing and browsing databases, tables, and data, including interactive components for refreshing data, expanding cell content, and dynamic rendering of database structures.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Render data in tabular format within the HTML container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Render individual cell content, handling objects and long strings with expandability.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggle expansion of cell content to show full data.
